values.name: Honesty
values.description: Being truthful and transparent in actions and words.

values.name: Integrity
values.description: Adhering to moral and ethical principles consistently.

values.name: Respect
values.description: Showing consideration and appreciation for others.

values.name: Compassion
values.description: Empathizing with others and showing kindness.

values.name: Responsibility
values.description: Being accountable for one's actions and obligations.

values.name: Fairness
values.description: Treating others equally and justly.

values.name: Loyalty
values.description: Being faithful and devoted to people or causes.

values.name: Courage
values.description: Facing challenges and fears with determination.

values.name: Perseverance
values.description: Persisting in efforts despite difficulties.

values.name: Humility
values.description: Having a modest view of one's importance.

values.name: Gratitude
values.description: Appreciating and being thankful for what one has.

values.name: Tolerance
values.description: Accepting and respecting differences in others.

values.name: Creativity
values.description: Valuing innovation and original ideas.

values.name: Independence
values.description: Valuing self-reliance and personal freedom.

values.name: Teamwork
values.description: Collaborating effectively with others.

values.name: Optimism
values.description: Maintaining a positive outlook on life.

values.name: Justice
values.description: Upholding fairness and legal rights.

values.name: Generosity
values.description: Willingness to give time, resources, or support to others.

values.name: Family
values.description: Prioritizing familial relationships and responsibilities.

values.name: Friendship
values.description: Valuing close relationships with friends.

values.name: Learning
values.description: Commitment to gaining knowledge and self-improvement.

values.name: Freedom
values.description: Valuing the ability to act and think independently.

values.name: Peace
values.description: Desiring harmony and absence of conflict.

values.name: Patience
values.description: Ability to endure difficulties without frustration.

values.name: Environmentalism
values.description: Commitment to protecting and preserving the natural world.
